Name: The Scuttering Reaches
Description: Intricate webs stretch into a darkness where the shadows are never entirely still. Gossamer threads stolen by the breeze tickle the goosebumps on your skin. A thousand unseen eyes promise a million more.

DefaultEvent.Name: A blockade of silk
DefaultEvent.Description: You are no longer welcome across the webbed bridge. The sorrow-spiders have no more need of you.

ChildBranches.Name: Visit the Web of Stone
ChildBranches.Description: You know the way. Perhaps the sorrow-spiders have further tasks for a trustworthy zailor.

DefaultEvent.Name: Terror without
DefaultEvent.Description: As the lights of the Nativity fade and the candles starts to flicker, the darkness of the Reaches becomes unbearable. Empty-handed but alive, you hurry back to the relative warmth and safety of the port.

ChildBranches.Name: Bring light into the darkness
ChildBranches.Description: The sorrow-spiders avoid the candlelight, but not out of any sense of fear. Though far from tolerant of outsiders, they care little enough for their abandoned webs to turn a blind eye to at least a little scavenging. Up to a point.

DefaultEvent.Name: Rage of the sorrow-spiders
DefaultEvent.Description: For a few precious minutes, it seems the sorrow-spiders are held at bay by the sad green glow. The second it flickers, that fantasy dies. It was not the dark they were waiting for, merely a signal. Fortunately you are still just... just... close enough to your ship to escape unscathed, save a few haunting memories. Not everyone however is so lucky.

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the sorrow-spiders' territory
ChildBranches.Description: The silence of the Reaches is broken by a low hiss that drills through your bones and teeth. The hate of the sorrow-spiders is the sound of uncountable legs beating a singular war-drum. Nothing good can come of this.

DefaultEvent.Name: Stumbling through the dark
DefaultEvent.Description:
The Reaches are no place to explore without some form of light. The endless sorrow-spiders surrounding you are less keeping their distance than enjoying the free show.

It soon becomes clear; this is a fool's errand. Being no fool, at least not today, you return to port empty-handed and shivering, but at least unscathed.

ChildBranches.Name: Risk exploring without candles
ChildBranches.Description: In this wasteland, only the false-stars in the roof of the Neath illuminate the webs and ruins the sorrow-spiders call home. You may still stumble upon something though. Or indeed, into something.
